modName: No music for Dragon Soul Absorb or Word Of Power Learn
summary: Tired of the loud \"epic\" music playing each time you\'ve killed a dragon or learned a new word of power? This is the mod for you.
descriptionHtml:
---Description---
Remember when you killed your first dragon? You might have thought that
the epic music playing when you absorbed it\'s soul enhanced the experience.

After killing over 50 dragons, I sure got tired of hearing that loud music
every single time. The same happens each time you learn a new word of power.

This mod silences that music. Simple as that!


---Install---
Unpack the file and copy the Data folder to your Skyrim directory.
(For example C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim)

Select \"overwrite all\" if asked.


---Uninstall---
Remove the music folder from your skyrim/Data directory.

If you have other music mods installed, go to skyrim/Data/music/special
and remove the three files that start with \"mus_special_wordofpower\".
author: dream0011111
